definitions.definition: not firmly held or fastened in place:
examples: There were some loose wires hanging out of the wall.

definitions.definition: Loose hair is not tied back:
examples: Her hair was hanging loose to her shoulders.

definitions.definition: Loose things are not held together or attached to anything else:
examples: A few loose sheets of paper were lying around.

definitions.definition: to speak or express emotions very freely, especially in an uncontrolled way:
examples: The coach loosed an angry tirade against his team.
